titleStmt.title: Poems upon several occasions with a voyage to the island of love : also The lover in fashion, being an account from Lydicus to Lysander of his voyage from the island of love / by Mrs. A. Behn ; to which is added a miscellany of new poems and songs, by several hands.
titleStmt.author: Behn, Aphra, 1640-1689.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
